content: Walk prudently when you go to the house of God; and draw near to hear rather than to give the sacrifice of fools, for they do not know that they do evil.
Do not let your mouth cause your flesh to sin, nor say before the messenger  that it  an error. Why should God be angry at your excuse and destroy the work of your hands?
For in the multitude of dreams and many words  also vanity. But fear God.
The Vanity of Gain and Honor

If you see the oppression of the poor, and the violent perversion of justice and righteousness in a province, do not marvel at the matter; for high official watches over high official, and higher officials are over them.
Moreover the profit of the land is for all;  the king is served from the field.

Here is what I have seen:  good and fitting  to eat and drink, and to enjoy the good of all his labor in which he toils under the sun all the days of his life which God gives him; for it  his heritage.
As for every man to whom God has given riches and wealth, and given him power to eat of it, to receive his heritage and rejoice in his laborâ€”this  the gift of God.
For he will not dwell unduly on the days of his life, because God keeps  busy with the joy of his heart.
